pathAssistantSteps.info:
New opportunity is identified. Input the following details to begin:


• Type of Opportunity

• Primary contact and his/her role

• Services, countries and volumes

• Needs (if integrated solution of 3 or more services)

• Estimated Business Start Date

Mark the opportunity as "Closed Lost", if you lost the opportunity. This will remove the opportunity from the active opportunities list.


Do mention the "Lost Reason" so that, learning can be captured and sales process can be updated.

Mark the opportunity as "Closed - Won" after getting the contract signed. This will trigger the on-boarding process (will be available in next phase).


IMPORTANT: Before closing an opportunity, please ensure that the Expected Revenue is correct and the latest quotation and contract has been uploaded in the system.

Customer has accepted our proposal. Please make sure the following information is filled in before you close the opportunity:


• Est. Business Start Date.

• Est. Decision Date.

• Quoted Sales price.

Negotiate proposal and resolve objections.


• Confirm all key decision makers are on board.

• Continue to sell value in order to negotiate the best price, number of services and close the opportunity.

After a proposal has been shared with the customer, please ensure:.


  • Quoted price is correct.
  • Proposal Submission Date has been updated.
  • Log your follow up with the customer under activity.
  • Upload the latest quotation in the files section.

Confirm details on an opportunity for pricing:


• Validate contact information is correct

• Confirm expected services, countries and volumes

• Confirm Estimated Business Start Date

• Complete Analysis (Opportunities, Target Rates etc.)

Quote has been received from pricing. Ensure the following is complete:


• Update the stage to inform the Opportunity and Account Team.

• Update Quoted Price to match pricing’s proposal.

• Forward e-mail via Opportunity to track it.
